functions.name: drive_file_external_share_warning_enabled
functions.description: Checks if external share warning is enabled for drive files in Filestore.

functions.name: drive_shared_drive_creation_enabled
functions.description: Checks if shared drive creation is enabled in Filestore.

functions.name: filestore_access_control_enforce_root_directory
functions.description: Checks if access control enforces root directory in Filestore.

functions.name: drive_shared_content_external_distribution_restricted
functions.description: Checks if external distribution of shared content is restricted in Filestore.

functions.name: drive_shared_settings_manager_access_restricted
functions.description: Checks if manager access to shared settings is restricted in Filestore.

functions.name: drive_shared_file_access_restricted_to_members
functions.description: Checks if shared file access is restricted to members in Filestore.

functions.name: drive_shared_file_download_print_copy_disabled
functions.description: Checks if download, print, and copy are disabled for shared files in Filestore.

notes: All functions are based on GCP FILESTORE API.
Ensure proper IAM permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
